Das Werk X Weltspiele - 18.10.2024

Collaborations between projects from different cities and countries are vital for the development of a diverse community and the electronic music scene. 
On October 18th, we‚Äôre teaming up with Weltspiele Club to deliver a unique musical experience in Hannover.

Our project will be represented by Das Werk co-founders Punktmidi & Omon Breaker. Hannover‚Äôs local scene will shine with the support of Weltspiele resident Ponygirl, while a special highlight will be the return of Lyza to her hometown.

lineup: GLXY, Kyrist, Annca, Benski, Gus, Ben Glock, Moonaddict, Molovv, Smeerlapp, Shay & Thrive
information:
Lineup:

GLXY (Shogun Audio | UK)
Kyrist (Kynetic Sound, Dark Mttr and Overview Music | UK)

Fr√§nzn
Shay B2B Annca
Smeerlapp B2B Molovv
Thrive B2B Gus B2B Moonaddict

Hosted by Benski

__________________________________

Can‚Äôt wait to dance with you again to great music and extraordinary guests making this the probably most exciting CLX to date!

Both of our guests from the UK (yes we‚Äôve got two!!!) are no newcomers to the scene. They have both gained some extra momentum recently through successful releases on top labels as well as appearances at some of the most exciting lineups of the summer.

While GLXY started creating a real buzz with their soul-drenched style of production, including amazing vocalists such as DRS and Solah, their recent productions have witnessed an interesting approach to the rather darker end of the spectrum which just enriches their quality output even more. They have been an integral part of Friction‚Äôs Label Shogun Audio since 2017 and have regularly delivered outstanding releases and mind bending sets across the globe for Shogun ever since. Besides that they have been gracing stages at the likes of Liquicity, Let It Roll and SUNANDBASS, upgrading lineups across Europe incl. Fabric, RSO, Ministry of Sound and many more as well having multiple appearences in North America and Australia.

Kyrist has undoubtedly justified her place at the forefront of the UK's Drum & Bass scene on multiple levels. Her rise to eminence as prolific dj, producer and label owner has been a result of talent, hard work and patience. Best known for her dark, bass driven punishing yet soulful sets she has been spreading vibes internationally, adding some extra pepper to events for Alix Perez's 1985 Music and Break's Symmetry Recordings and is no stranger to the big festival stages such as Let It Roll, Outlook, Boomtown & Hospitality On The Beach, Glastonbury and Tomorrowland. As producer she has launched her own imprint Kynetic Sound in 2021 following from stand-out releases on Dispatch, Critical, and Hospital cementing her place in the scene even more.

This amazing Lineup will be rounded off by Fr√§nzn who delivered an extraordinary set at the Fete de la Musique this summer for us as well as our good friends Gus and our ‚ÄòBirthday Boy‚Äô Thrive and the CLX gang.

Last but not least, we want to tell you how much we missed dancing with you! We hope you had a lovely summer with your besties and can‚Äôt wait to show you great music and celebrate the club season with you and our amazing guests.

__________________________________

CLX = Striving to create a place for everyone to fully enjoy sophisticated and raw Drum and Bass. Cherishing the past while creating the future. Junglists, newcomers, uptempo fans and ravers are welcome.

information:
DJ HELL
Helmut Josef Geier alias DJ Hell ist eine Institution in der deutschen DJ-Szene. Der urspr√ºnglich gelernte Betriebsschlosser hat die Techno- und House-Szene gepr√§gt wie kein Zweiter. Als Resident-DJ in den renommiertesten M√ºnchner Techno-Klubs lie√ü er seit Mitte der 80er - nur unterbrochen durch Stippvisiten in Berlin und New York - die Puppen tanzen. Selbst in Hugh Heffners ber√ºhmter Playboy-Villa gab er ein Gastspiel. Der geb√ºrtige Altenmarkter und im Jahr 2003 vom GQ-Magazin gek√ºrte "Man of the Year" in der Kategorie Musik kultiviert au√üerdem seine hohe Design- und Modeaffinit√§t. Er designte ein Zimmer im M√ºnchner Flushing Meadow Hotel und produzierte die Musik f√ºr Modenschauen von Hugo Boss & Donatella Versace.

GREGOR TRESHER
Die Karriere von Gregor Tresher begann in den Neunziger Jahren in Frankfurt. Der Durchbruch gelang ihm Mitte der Zweitausender mit √úberhits, wie ‚ÄûA Thousand Nights‚Äú, die heute den Status ‚ÄûAll-Time-Classic‚Äú genie√üen. Seine Releases erschienen √ºber die Jahre auf solch illustren Labels, wie Cocoon, Ovum, Drumcode oder auch Music Man. Als Remixer arbeitete er z.B. f√ºr Laurent Garnier oder auch Sven V√§th. Seitdem ist der Musiker und Labelinhaber nicht nur mehrfach von diversen Szenemagazinen als bester Produzent ausgezeichnet worden, sondern weltweit in den angesagtesten Clubs und auf den gr√∂√üten Festivals zu Gast.

November treffen sich im Klub PAN wieder hunderte Kinksters, zum letzten Mal in diesem Jahr, zu einer besonderen Fusion: deeper, rawer Techno-Underground trifft auf die schillernden Facetten des Berliner Hedonismus.

lineup: RIKHTER¬†, Aiden (DE)¬†, KOWOLSKI¬†, PARA|D√òX
information:
EXIT presents RIKHTER LIVE & AIDEN at PAN Hannover.

Rikhter balances out the wanton destruction with a dose of romance. Performing live, the 44 LABEL GROUP artist knows his way around an earworm. His high velocity tracks glide with hard-edged elegance, softened by his frankly expressive melodic sensibility and rich harmonies.

From New York to Berlin by way of Milan, British-American @aiden is part of a new generation of artists blurring the lines between past, present and future. Her fierce productions blend sounds of industrial, hardcore and rave - the result of her exposure to the frenetic world of US dance music culture combined with the rich musical legacy of her UK roots already earning her a seat at the table of Kobosil's mighty R Label Group.

information:
We invite you to our fifth Indoor Rave at the brand new event location Cloud 9 (Expo Plaza Hannover).

The EXIT Indoor Rave stands for an intimate, dance floor oriented experience with a massive sound! We will install a big Funktion One sound system, introduce a modern light production and create a Boiler Set-Up. Let us feel free and connect eye to eye with the artists on the dance floor. EXIT is a liberal, open-minded place that encourages diversity, tolerance & equality.

EXIT Floor:
OGUZ ‚Ä¢ MANSIST ‚Ä¢ TBA

PAN Floor:
TBA


OGUZ has been forging a path in the electronic music scene for almost a decade. Hailing from just outside of Amsterdam, OGUZ has become a driving force in the international Techno scene, captivating audiences with his mesmerising sets and innovative productions. With hits like "GOLDEN SZN‚Äô" "FC Horsepower‚Äô"and "So Alive" amassing millions of plays in mere months. OGUZ's journey shows no signs of slowing down. He has shown his creative agility as a multidisciplinary artist spanning a number of genres and musical styles. With a steady stream of releases on the horizon and a community of fans behind him, OGUZ is poised to expand his reach even further and solidify his position as a trailblazer in the genre. Continually pushing the boundaries of his craft, OGUZ remains dedicated to evolving the electronic music scene and leaving an enduring legacy.

information:
EXIT presents FUNK TRIU at Klub PAN Hannover, GER.

Funk Tribu is a producer and DJ from Colombia, based in Berlin. His music is highly influenced by the electronic sound of the 90s & '00s, creating a retro-futuristic atmosphere. Since his mega hit ‚ÄòPhonky Tribu‚Äô, Funk Tribu is known for shaping the groovy trance sound nowadays with his genre-fluid productions. You can find his work on renown labels like Speedmaster Records, KTK, Taapion, Color, A Million, Terminal V, Teletech and many more.
